page.title: 18Communications in Horton.
page.content: The area's communications are not very good.The village of Horton contains a Post Office just in the edge of our square.The Post Office occupies one room of a large modern house.It only opens in the morning. There are two telephone boxes in our square ,one is in Horton and the other is at Little Sodbury End.Most houses have their own telephones. There are a number of Post boxes through out the area and collecting times are twice daily execpt Sundays Delivery of post is by Royal Mail van every week-day mornings.There are no newspaper deliveries- these have to be collected from Chipping Sodbury by the residents.
